Hey team, *<@U0251UW1YUE>* needs support! :goodchop_fan:Please check the details.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

*Priority:* Medium :large_yellow_circle: 
*Topic:* CCM / Menu / AddOns / Menu Replacement


:mag: *Issue reported:*
Request from another channel: Hi team, can we swap index `293` for index `5` in all upcoming weeks (W37 onward). Thanks


:footprints: *Steps to reproduce:*
N/A

elements.text: Request from another channel: Hi team, can we swap index
in all upcoming weeks (W37 onward). Thanks

_thread_replies.text:
Thanks for the report! We will get back to you as soon as possible :blobthumbsup:

Meanwhile, please check our <https://hellofresh.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/TNV/pages/4049372305/How+tos|How-To section>. It might help you speed up the process depending on the type of the request.

elements.text: Thanks for the report! We will get back to you as soon as possible
. It might help you speed up the process depending on the type of the request.

_thread_replies.text:
hey <@U01B2LBUPND> we got your request to swap index `293` for index `5` in all upcoming weeks (W37 onward) but we need up to which week you need this change

can you share this info please so i can generate it timely for you? thanks!

elements.text: we got your request to swap index

in all upcoming weeks (W37 onward) but we need up to which week you need this change

can you share this info please so i can generate it timely for you? thanks!

_thread_replies.text: also feel free to raise these menu replacement requests here on our public channel so if we need to follow up with the request we can reach out easily in the thread :+1:

elements.text: also feel free to raise these menu replacement requests here on our public channel so if we need to follow up with the request we can reach out easily in the thread

_thread_replies.text: cc <@U01AKGWGLC8>
Thanks Bolo
no worries! but let me know from W37 to which week i need to do these changes <@U01B2LBUPND> :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: no worries! but let me know from W37 to which week i need to do these changes

_thread_replies.text: <@U01B2LBUPND> we have menus right now til W49 on CCM I see, should we do this W37 - W49 then?

elements.text: we have menus right now til W49 on CCM I see, should we do this W37 - W49 then?

_thread_replies.text: Correct. 12 weeks out

in this particular case you mentioned we're doing the swap so that we can permanently discontinue the `293` SKU

does it mean after W49 we'd have to do the same swaps or when you create the next set of menus, can you directly replace it to index `5` yourself?

elements.text: in this particular case you mentioned we're doing the swap so that we can permanently discontinue the

SKU

does it mean after W49 we'd have to do the same swaps or when you create the next set of menus, can you directly replace it to index

_thread_replies.text:
Because we're making the change on a relatively large time range (12 weeks), nearly all active customers are updated and we dont need to do it again.

That being said, reactivations can still see the discontinued product. That's usually a very very small number of orders and we monitor it so if it grows we'll do another swap.

If we wanted to fix this, we'd need to have a way to make the substitution in customers selections directly rather than in boxes

elements.text:
Because we're making the change on a relatively large time range (12 weeks), nearly all active customers are updated and we dont need to do it again.

That being said, reactivations can still see the discontinued product. That's usually a very very small number of orders and we monitor it so if it grows we'll do another swap.

If we wanted to fix this, we'd need to have a way to make the substitution in customers selections directly rather than in boxes

_thread_replies.text: understood thanks for the context
okay it took a while but here you go all the replacements CVs <@U01B2LBUPND> :saluting-face:

elements.text: okay it took a while but here you go all the replacements CVs

_thread_replies.text: Thank you bolo!!

messages.text:
Hey team, *<@U03HCD899EJ>* needs support! :goodchop_fan:Please check the details.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

*Priority:* Medium :large_yellow_circle: 
*Topic:* Code Review


:mag: *Issue reported:*
PR with mostly tests to add additional Contentful translation keys in the Discount Communication components for sub-brands. This is not active in Factor Form yet (PR to follow) so all should be BAU for GoodChop.

Everything sub-branded is optional and defaults to false, so there is not functional change to GoC banner.

Can I please get a review and QA of this?
<https://github.com/hellofresh/web/pull/57090>


:footprints: *Steps to reproduce:*
N/A

elements.text:
PR with mostly tests to add additional Contentful translation keys in the Discount Communication components for sub-brands. This is not active in Factor Form yet (PR to follow) so all should be BAU for GoodChop.

Everything sub-branded is optional and defaults to false, so there is not functional change to GoC banner.

Can I please get a review and QA of this?

_thread_replies.text:
Thanks for the report! We will get back to you as soon as possible :blobthumbsup:

Meanwhile, please check our <https://hellofresh.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/TNV/pages/4049372305/How+tos|How-To section>. It might help you speed up the process depending on the type of the request.

elements.text: Thanks for the report! We will get back to you as soon as possible
. It might help you speed up the process depending on the type of the request.

I have a question related to QA
With MWD account, I am able to test the modal (refer screenshot) :white_check_mark:

For BAU (refer screenshot 2), I can't the banner on which I can click :yellow-square:
creds: `<mailto:bau+2@gc.com|bau+2@gc.com>` pass:123456
could you check or let me know where i can test this?

_thread_replies.text: thanks for testing <@U044SKGT4R5>. I don’t think I understand the issue. I am happy to check, but could you elaborate a bit about the expectation?

elements.text: . I don’t think I understand the issue

_thread_replies.text:
So I created a fresh account without any MWD voucher...
So as per PR description, I'm trying to test following points:

*BAU
• Should show the discount inline banner
• Should show the modal when clicked
• Modal should show 1 in progress, 2 left
I can't see any banner (refer second screenshot)... how can I test this?

elements.text:

_thread_replies.text:
sorry, I guess how I wrote it isn’t great. BAU for the banner is what I meant vs. any changed behaviour for it.

If you created an account without any multi week voucher and you don’t see the banner, that’s correct behaviour. it should only show if there are multiple discounts as I understand it, which you were able to confirm already
